053     public static Document loadXMLFile(File file) throws JDOMException, IOException
054     {
055         return loadXMLFile(file, true);
056     }
057 
058     public static Document loadXMLFile(File file, boolean bExpandEntities) throws JDOMException, IOException
059     {
060         // builder.setExpandEntities(bExpandEntities);
061         // if (!bExpandEntities)
062         SAXBuilder builder = new SAXBuilder();
063         builder.setExpandEntities(bExpandEntities);
064         // builder.setEntityResolver(new NullEntityResolver());
065         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder("file:");
066         for (String s2 : file.toString().split("\\\\")) {
067             for (String s : s2.split("/")) {
068                 sb.append('/');
069                 s = URLEncoder.encode(s, "UTF-8");
070                 s = s.replace("+", "%20");
071                 sb.append(s);
072             }
073         }
074         URL url = new URL(sb.toString());
075         Document doc = builder.build(url);
076         return doc;
077     }
078 
079     public static Document loadXMLFile(InputStream reader) throws JDOMException, IOException
080     {
081         return loadXMLFile(reader, true);
082     }
083 
084     public static Document loadXMLFile(Reader reader) throws JDOMException, IOException
085     {
086         return loadXMLFile(reader, true);
087     }
088 
089     public static Document loadXMLFile(InputStream reader, boolean bExpandEntities) throws JDOMException, IOException
090     {
091         SAXBuilder builder = new SAXBuilder();
092         builder.setExpandEntities(bExpandEntities);
093         Document doc = builder.build(reader);
094         return doc;
095     }
096 
097     public static Document loadXMLFile(Reader reader, boolean bExpandEntities) throws JDOMException, IOException
098     {
099         SAXBuilder builder = new SAXBuilder();
100         builder.setExpandEntities(bExpandEntities);
101         Document doc = builder.build(reader);
102         return doc;
103     }

132     public static void saveXMLFilePretty(Element xmlRoot, DocType docType, File file) throws JDOMException, IOException
133     {
134         Document doc = new Document(xmlRoot);
135         saveXMLFilePretty(doc, docType, file);
136         doc.detachRootElement();
137     }
138 
139     public static void saveXMLFilePretty(Document doc, DocType docType, File file) throws JDOMException, IOException
140     {
141         if (docType != null) doc.setDocType(docType);
142         FileWriter fw = null;
143         try {
144             fw = new FileWriter(file);
145             /*
146             Format format = outputter.getFormat().cloneDocument();
147             format.setTextMode(Format.TextMode.TRIM);
148             format.setEscapeStrategy(new EscapeStrategy() {
149                 @Override
150                 public boolean shouldEscape(char ch)
151                 {
152                     return true;
153                 }
154             });
155             outputter.setFormat(format);
156             */
157             outputterPretty.output(doc, fw);
158             // doc.detachRootElement();
159         } finally {
160             if (fw != null) {
161                 fw.close();
162             }
163         }
164     }
165 
166     public static void saveXMLFilePretty(Document doc, DocType docType, File file, boolean bResolveEntities) throws JDOMException, IOException
167     {
168         FileWriter fw = null;
169         try {
170             fw = new FileWriter(file);
171             saveXMLFilePretty(doc, docType, fw, bResolveEntities, true);
172         } finally {
173             if (fw != null) {
174                 fw.close();
175             }
176         }
177     }

254     public static void saveXMLFilePretty(Document doc, DocType docType, Writer w, boolean bResolveEntities, boolean bCloseWriter) throws JDOMException, IOException
255     {
256         // TODO: Passing the docType here is not good. Remove that feature.
257 
258         if (bResolveEntities) {
259             StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
260 
261             if (docType != null) doc.setDocType(docType);
262             try {
263                 outputterPretty.output(doc, sw);
264             } finally {
265                 sw.close();
266             }
267 
268             doc = XMLUtils.loadXMLFile(new StringReader(sw.toString()), true);
269             doc.setDocType(null);
270         } else {
271             if (docType != null) doc.setDocType(docType);
272         }
273 
274         try {
275             outputterPretty.output(doc, w);
276         } finally {
277             if (bCloseWriter) {
278                 w.close();
279             }
280         }
281     }
282 
283     public static void saveXMLFilePretty(Document doc, DocType docType, OutputStream w, boolean bResolveEntities, boolean bCloseWriter) throws JDOMException, IOException
284     {
285         // TODO: Passing the docType here is not good. Remove that feature.
286 
287         if (bResolveEntities) {
288             StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
289 
290             if (docType != null) doc.setDocType(docType);
291             try {
292                 outputterPretty.output(doc, sw);
293             } finally {
294                 sw.close();
295             }
296 
297             doc = XMLUtils.loadXMLFile(new StringReader(sw.toString()), true);
298             doc.setDocType(null);
299         } else {
300             if (docType != null) doc.setDocType(docType);
301         }
302 
303         if (docType != null) doc.setDocType(docType);
304         try {
305             outputterPretty.output(doc, w);
306         } finally {
307             if (bCloseWriter) {
308                 w.close();
309             }
310         }
311     }

429     public static Element createChild(Element xmlRoot, String name)
430     {
431         Element e = new Element(name);
432         xmlRoot.addContent(e);
433         return e;
434     }
435 
436     private static String __htmlTextToPlainText(String text)
437     {
438         text = text.replace("<", "&lt;");
439         text = text.replace(">", "&gt;");
440         return text;
441     }
442 
443     private static void __htmlTextToPlainText(String text, Writer writer) throws IOException
444     {
445         StringReader sr = new StringReader(text);
446         char[] chunk = new char[1024*64];
447 
448         while (true) {
449             int charsRead = sr.read(chunk, 0, chunk.length);
450             if (charsRead <= 0) break;
451 
452             int lastPos = 0;
453             for (int i = 0; i < chunk.length; i++) {
454                 if (chunk[i] == '<') {
455                     writer.write(chunk, lastPos, i - lastPos);
456                     writer.write("&lt;");
457                     lastPos = i + 1;
458                 } else
459                 if (chunk[i] == '>') {
460                     writer.write(chunk, lastPos, i - lastPos);
461                     writer.write("&gt;");
462                     lastPos = i + 1;
463                 }
464             }
465             if (lastPos < chunk.length) {
466                 writer.write(chunk, lastPos, chunk.length - lastPos);
467             }
468         }
469     }
470 
471     public static void convertXmlToHtml5(String text, String title, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme, Writer writer) throws IOException
472     {
473         if (tagColorScheme != null) {
474             writer.write("<!DOCTYPE html><html lang=\"en\"><head>"
475                 + "<title>" + title + "</title>"
476                 + "<meta charset=\"utf-8\"></meta>"
477                 + "</head><body>");
478             __toColoredHtml(text, tagColorScheme, writer);
479             writer.write("</body></html>");
480         } else {
481             text = text.replace("<", "&lt;").replace(">", "&gt;");
482             writer.write("<!DOCTYPE html><html lang=\"en\"><head>"
483                 + "<title>" + title + "</title>"
484                 + "<meta charset=\"utf-8\"></meta>"
485                 + "</head><body><pre>");
486             // __htmlTextToPlainText(text, writer);
487             writer.write(text);
488             writer.write("</pre></body></html>");
489         }
490     }
491 
492     private static String __getNextWord(String s, int pos)
493     {
494         int i = 0;
495         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
496         while (pos + i < s.length()) {
497             char c = s.charAt(pos + i);
498             if (Character.isLetter(c)) {
499                 sb.append(c);
500             } else {
501                 break;
502             }
503             i++;
504         }
505         if (sb.length() == 0) return null;
506         return sb.toString();
507     }
508 
509     /*
510     private static String __toColoredHtml(String xmlText, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme)
511     {
512         String[] lines = xmlText.split("\r\n");
513         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
514         for (int i = 0; i < lines.length; i++) {
515             String line = lines[i];
516             if (line.trim().length() == 0) continue;
517 
518             line = line.replace("\t", "    ");
519             line = line.replace("<", "|<|");
520             line = line.replace(">", "|>|");
521             while (true) {
522                 int pos = line.indexOf("|<|");
523                 if (pos < 0) break;
524                 String tagName = __getNextWord(line, pos + 3);
525                 String color = null;
526                 if (tagName != null) {
527                     color = tagColorScheme.get(tagName);
528                 }
529                 if (color != null) {
530                     line = line.substring(0, pos) + "<span style=\"color: " + color + "; font-weight: bold;\">&lt;" + line.substring(pos + 3);
531                 } else {
532                     line = line.substring(0, pos) + "<span style=\"color: #808080;\">&lt;" + line.substring(pos + 3);
533                 }
534             }
535             line = line.replace("|>|", "&gt;</span>");
536             int n = line.length();
537             line = line.trim();
538             n -= line.length();
539             for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
540                 line = "&nbsp;&nbsp;" + line;
541             }
542             sb.append(line);
543             sb.append("<br />\r\n");
544         }
545         return sb.toString();
546     }
547     */
548 
549     private static void __toColoredHtml(String xmlText, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme, Writer writer) throws IOException
550     {
551         BufferedReader br = new BufferedReader(new StringReader(xmlText));
552 
553         String line;
554         // String[] lines = xmlText.split("\r\n");
555         while ((line = br.readLine()) != null) {
556             __toColoredHtmlLine(line, tagColorScheme, writer);
557         }
558     }
559 
560     private static void __toColoredHtmlLine(String line, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme, Writer writer) throws IOException
561     {
562         if (line.trim().length() == 0) return;
563 
564         line = line.replace("\t", "    ");
565         line = line.replace("<", "|<|");
566         line = line.replace(">", "|>|");
567         while (true) {
568             int pos = line.indexOf("|<|");
569             if (pos < 0) break;
570             String tagName = __getNextWord(line, pos + 3);
571             String color = null;
572             if (tagName != null) {
573                 color = tagColorScheme.get(tagName);
574             }
575             if (color != null) {
576                 line = line.substring(0, pos) + "<span style=\"color: " + color + "; font-weight: bold;\">&lt;" + line.substring(pos + 3);
577             } else {
578                 line = line.substring(0, pos) + "<span style=\"color: #808080;\">&lt;" + line.substring(pos + 3);
579             }
580         }
581         line = line.replace("|>|", "&gt;</span>");
582         int n = line.length();
583         line = line.trim();
584         n -= line.length();
585         StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
586         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
587             sb.append("&nbsp;&nbsp;");
588         }
589         writer.append(sb.toString());
590         writer.append(line);
591         writer.append("<br />\r\n");
592     }
593 
594     public static void convertXmlToHtml5(String text, String title, File outputFile, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme) throws IOException
595     {
596         FileWriter fw = null;
597         BufferedWriter bw = null;
598         try {
599             fw = new FileWriter(outputFile);
600             bw = new BufferedWriter(fw);
601             convertXmlToHtml5(text, title, tagColorScheme, bw);
602         } finally {
603             if (bw != null) {
604                 try {
605                     bw.close();
606                 } catch (Exception ee) {
607                 }
608                 fw = null;
609             }
610             if (fw != null) {
611                 try {
612                     fw.close();
613                 } catch (Exception ee) {
614                 }
615             }
616         }
617     }
618 
619     public static String convertXmlToHtml5(Document xmlDoc, String title, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme) throws JDOMException, IOException
620     {
621         StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
622         saveXMLFilePretty(xmlDoc, sw, true);
623         xmlDoc = null;
624         String inText = sw.toString();
625         sw = null;
626         StringWriter outSW = new StringWriter();
627         convertXmlToHtml5(inText, title, tagColorScheme, outSW);
628         inText = null;
629         return outSW.toString();
630     }
631 
632     /*
633     public static String convertXmlToHtml5(Element xmlRoot, String title, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme) throws JDOMException, IOException
634     {
635         StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
636         saveXMLFilePretty(xmlRoot, sw, true);
637         xmlRoot = null;
638         return convertXmlToHtml5(sw.toString(), title, tagColorScheme);
639     }
640     */
641 
642     public static void convertXmlToHtml5(Document xmlDoc, String title, File outputFile, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme) throws JDOMException, IOException
643     {
644         StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
645         saveXMLFilePretty(xmlDoc, sw, true);
646         xmlDoc = null;
647         String s = sw.toString();
648         sw = null;
649 
650         FileWriter fw = null;
651         BufferedWriter bw = null;
652         try {
653             fw = new FileWriter(outputFile);
654             bw = new BufferedWriter(fw);
655             convertXmlToHtml5(s, title, tagColorScheme, bw);
656         } finally {
657             if (bw != null) {
658                 try {
659                     bw.close();
660                 } catch (Exception ee) {
661                 }
662                 fw = null;
663             }
664             if (fw != null) {
665                 try {
666                     fw.close();
667                 } catch (Exception ee) {
668                 }
669             }
670         }
671     }

705     public static String convertXmlToHtml5(File xmlFile, String title, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme) throws JDOMException, IOException
706     {

710 
711     public static void convertXmlToHtml5(File xmlFile, String title, File outputFile, HashMap<String, String> tagColorScheme) throws JDOMException, IOException
712     {
713         FileWriter fw = null;
714         BufferedWriter bw = null;
715         try {
716             fw = new FileWriter(outputFile);
717             bw = new BufferedWriter(fw);
718             convertXmlToHtml5(IOUtils.loadFileAsText(xmlFile), title, tagColorScheme, bw);
719         } finally {
720             if (bw != null) {
721                 try {
722                     bw.close();
723                 } catch (Exception ee) {
724                 }
725                 fw = null;
726             }
727             if (fw != null) {
728                 try {
729                     fw.close();
730                 } catch (Exception ee) {
731                 }
732             }
733         }
734     }
735 
736     public static Document cloneDocument(Document xmlDoc) throws JDOMException, IOException
737     {
738         StringWriter sw = new StringWriter();
739         saveXMLFilePretty(xmlDoc, sw, true);
740         xmlDoc = null;
741         return loadXMLFile(new StringReader(sw.toString()));
742     }
743 
744     /**
745      * Retrieve all content objects from this element. After this process <code>e</code> won't have
746      * content objects any more.
747      */
748     public static ArrayList<Content> extractContentAndDetach(Element xml)
749     {
750         List<Content> contentList = xml.getContent();
751         ArrayList<Content> ret = new ArrayList<Content>();
752         for (Content c : contentList) {
753             ret.add(c);
754         }
755         for (Content c : ret) {
756             c.detach();
757         }
758         return ret;
759 
760     }
761 
762     /**
763      * Retrieve all content objects from this element. After this process <code>e</code> won't have
764      * content objects any more.
765      */
766     public static ArrayList<Element> extractChildrenAndDetach(Element xml)
767     {
768         List<Element> contentList = xml.getChildren();
769         ArrayList<Element> ret = new ArrayList<Element>();
770         for (Element e : contentList) {
771             ret.add(e);
772         }
773         for (Element e : ret) {
774             e.detach();
775         }
776         return ret;
777 
778     }
779 
780     public static Element createPath(Element xmlRoot, String[] pathElements)
781     {
782         Element e = xmlRoot;
783         for (int i = 0; i < pathElements.length; i++) {
784             Element eParent = e;
785             e = e.getChild(pathElements[i]);
786             if (e == null) {
787                 e = new Element(pathElements[i]);
788                 eParent.addContent(e);
789             }
790         }
791         return e;
792     }
793 
794     /**
795      * Bring the child elements in the specified XML element in the correct order by first removing
796      * them all and then adding them in the correct order.
797      */
798     public static void orderChildElements(Element xml, String[] names)
799     {
800         ArrayList<Element> list = new ArrayList<Element>();
801         for (int i = 0; i < names.length; i++) {
802             List<Element> eList = xml.getChildren(names[i]);
803             if (eList != null) list.addAll(eList);
804         }
805         for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
806             Element e = list.get(i);
807             xml.removeContent(e);
808         }
809         for (int i = 0; i < list.size(); i++) {
810             Element e = list.get(i);
811             xml.addContent(e);
812         }
813     }
814 
815     public static Element cloneTreeWithoutNameSpaces(Element xmlSrc, StringSet stringSet)
816     {
817         if (stringSet == null) stringSet = new StringSet();
818 
819         Element xmlDest = new Element(stringSet.s(xmlSrc.getName()));
820         cloneTreeWithoutNameSpaces(xmlSrc, xmlDest, stringSet);
821         return xmlDest;
822     }
823 
824     public static Content cloneTreeWithoutNameSpaces(Content c, StringSet stringSet)
825     {
826         if (stringSet == null) stringSet = new StringSet();
827 
828         if (c instanceof Element) {
829             Element ce = (Element)c;
830             Element e = new Element(stringSet.s(ce.getName()));
831             for (Attribute a : ce.getAttributes()) {
832                 e.setAttribute(stringSet.s(a.getName()), stringSet.s(a.getValue()));
833             }
834             cloneTreeWithoutNameSpaces(ce, e, stringSet);
835             return e;
836         } else
837         if (c instanceof Comment) {
838             Element ce = (Element)c;
839             Element e = new Element(stringSet.s(ce.getText()));
840             return e;
841         } else
842         if (c instanceof DocType) {
843             DocType ce = (DocType)c;
844             DocType e = new DocType(stringSet.s(ce.getElementName()));
845             return e;
846         } else
847         if (c instanceof EntityRef) {
848             EntityRef ce = (EntityRef)c;
849             EntityRef e = new EntityRef(stringSet.s(ce.getName()));
850             return e;
851         } else
852         if (c instanceof Text) {
853             Text ce = (Text)c;
854             Text e = new Text(stringSet.s(ce.getText()));
855             return e;
856         } else {
857             throw new ImplementationErrorException();
858         }
859     }
860 
861     public static void cloneTreeWithoutNameSpaces(Element xmlSrc, Element xmlDest, StringSet stringSet)
862     {
863         if (stringSet == null) stringSet = new StringSet();
864 
865         for (Attribute a : xmlSrc.getAttributes()) {
866             xmlDest.setAttribute(stringSet.s(a.getName()), stringSet.s(a.getValue()));
867         }
868 
869         for (Content c : xmlSrc.getContent()) {
870             if (c instanceof Element) {
871                 Element ce = (Element)c;
872                 Element e = new Element(stringSet.s(ce.getName()));
873                 cloneTreeWithoutNameSpaces(ce, e, stringSet);
874                 xmlDest.addContent(cloneTreeWithoutNameSpaces((Element)e, stringSet));
875             } else
876             if (c instanceof Comment) {
877                 Element ce = (Element)c;
878                 Element e = new Element(stringSet.s(ce.getText()));
879                 xmlDest.addContent(e);
880             } else
881             if (c instanceof DocType) {
882                 DocType ce = (DocType)c;
883                 DocType e = new DocType(stringSet.s(ce.getElementName()));
884                 xmlDest.addContent(e);
885             } else
886             if (c instanceof EntityRef) {
887                 EntityRef ce = (EntityRef)c;
888                 EntityRef e = new EntityRef(stringSet.s(ce.getName()));
889                 xmlDest.addContent(e);
890             } else
891             if (c instanceof Text) {
892                 Text ce = (Text)c;
893                 Text e = new Text(stringSet.s(ce.getText()));
894                 xmlDest.addContent(e);
895             } else {
896                 throw new ImplementationErrorException();
897             }
898         }
899     }
900 
901     public static Element getByPath(Document doc, String ... nodeNames)
902     {
903         return getByPath(doc.getRootElement(), nodeNames);
904     }
905 
906     public static Element getByPath(Element xmlDocRoot, String ... nodeNames)
907     {
908         Element x = xmlDocRoot;
909         if (!x.getName().equals(nodeNames[0])) return null;
910 
911         for (int i = 1; i < nodeNames.length; i++) {
912             x = x.getChild(nodeNames[i]);
913             if (x == null) return null;
914         }
915 
916         return x;
917     }

923         for (int i = 0; i < pathElements.length; i++) {
924             e = e.getChild(pathElements[i]);
925             if (e == null) return null;
926         }
927         return e;
928     }
